KDS_Diagnose.updateAql: SELECT c/uid/value AS uid_based_id FROM EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c WHERE c/archetype_details/template_id/value = '%s' AND c/feeder_audit/originating_system_audit/system_id = '%s' AND c/context/other_context/items[at0002]/value/value = '%s'

KDS_Prozedur.updateAql: SELECT c/uid/value AS uid_based_id FROM EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c WHERE c/archetype_details/template_id/value = '%s' AND c/feeder_audit/originating_system_audit/system_id = '%s' AND c/context/other_context/items[at0002]/value/value = '%s'
KDS_Prozedur.deleteAql: SELECT e/ehr_id/value AS ehr_id, c/uid/value AS uid_based_id FROM EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c WHERE c/archetype_details/template_id/value = '%s' AND c/feeder_audit/originating_system_audit/system_id = '%s' AND c/context/other_context/items[at0002]/value/value = '%s'

KDS_Todesursache.updateAql: SELECT c/uid/value AS uid_based_id FROM EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c WHERE c/archetype_details/template_id/value = '%s' AND c/feeder_audit/originating_system_audit/system_id = '%s' AND c/context/other_context/items[at0002]/value/value = '%s'

SOFA.updateAql: SELECT c/uid/value AS uid_based_id FROM EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c WHERE c/archetype_details/template_id/value = '%s' AND c/feeder_audit/originating_system_audit/system_id = '%s' AND c/feeder_audit/originating_system_item_ids/id = '%s'
